General.Name: Arriyadh Development Co.
General.Description: Arriyadh Development Co. constructs, rents, and sells residential and non-residential buildings, prefabricated buildings, and government buildings in Saudi Arabia. It also engages in the renovations of residential and non-residential buildings. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: King Fahad Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11462

5.Name: Mr. Nasser bin Saad Al Arifi
